channel.title: Visualization and Delivery on Data, Smarter.
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization and Delivery on Data, Smarter.

item.title: Crunchbox research
item.description: Researchers create a Crunchbox with a few clicks. Choose the data and dimensions to be included. Then deliver a CrunchBox inside a CrunchBoard dashboard or in any website of your choosing. Add annotations and verbage to outline your insight to the customer. Include multiple Crunchboxes covering different topics or content.

item.title: Crunchbox
item.description: As a market researcher or a market insights professional youâ€™ll sit on the edge of your seat when we demo the revolutionary self-serve capabilities of the Crunchbox.
